::Savanna::

She gave out a low growl.  Kluster was not her companion yet. Nore 
was he her commander. She had no ;oyalty to him other than he was 
another maximal.

She tranxformed into lion mode and sat in her corner growling in a 
very low growl.  She didn't like being told to stay anywhere she 
didn't want to stay.  Her face showed her discontent. She looked at 
Blurr.

"Great, now we stay and babysit a grounded ship."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster nods. "Me and Hysteria will accompany you. Blur, you and 
Savanah stay 
> here and defend the ship. We'll be back shortly."
> 
> With that, he stands up, turning to Phobia and motioning him to 
lead on.
